mapper.sql: t.id id, t.gwid gwid, t.szxs szxs, t.gsdw gsdw, t.lxfs lxfs, t.gwxs gwxs, t.gwzj gwzj, t.gwyl gwyl, t.jkxs jkxs, t.ll ll, t.jgid jgid, t.jlzt jlzt, t.cszt cszt, t.sjbb sjbb, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.ywxtbsid ywxtbsid, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.bz bz, t.vercol vercol
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM SY_XHSSXXX t WHERE 1=1 AND JLZT = 1

SELECT
FROM SY_XHSSXXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SY_XHSSXXX(id,gwid,szxs,gsdw,lxfs,gwxs,gwzj,gwyl,jkxs,ll,jgid,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sjc,bz,vercol) VALUES(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{szxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gwxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gwzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{gwyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jkxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{vercol,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE SY_XHSSXXX t SET t.JLZT = 0 WHERE 1=1 AND t.ID = #{value}

INSERT INTO SY_XHSSXXX(id,gwid,szxs,gsdw,lxfs,gwxs,gwzj,gwyl,jkxs,ll,jgid,jlzt,cszt,sjbb,cjsj,ywxtbsid,sjc,bz,vercol) VALUES
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} id,#{item.gwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gwid,#{item.szxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} szxs,#{item.gsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gsdw,#{item.lxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} lxfs,#{item.gwxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gwxs,#{item.gwzj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gwzj,#{item.gwyl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} gwyl,#{item.jkxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jkxs,#{item.ll,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ll,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jlzt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} jlzt,#{item.cszt,jdbcType=DOUBLE} cszt,#{item.sjbb,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sjbb,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.ywxtbsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ywxtbsid,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.vercol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} vercol
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = VALUES(id), gwid = VALUES(gwid), szxs = VALUES(szxs), gsdw = VALUES(gsdw), lxfs = VALUES(lxfs), gwxs = VALUES(gwxs), gwzj = VALUES(gwzj), gwyl = VALUES(gwyl), jkxs = VALUES(jkxs), ll = VALUES(ll), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jlzt = VALUES(jlzt), cszt = VALUES(cszt), sjbb = VALUES(sjbb), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), ywxtbsid = VALUES(ywxtbsid), sjc = VALUES(sjc), bz = VALUES(bz), vercol = VALUES(vercol)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM SY_XHSSXXX t WHERE t.JLZT = 1
